Communication in Context:
Exploring new mobile applications

front.div:
Abstract-
In this paper we present an approach for matching
innovative applications with upcoming mobile tech-
nologies, like UMTS, through structured service de-
scription. Eventually, this approach can be used to
perform market analysis for mobile services, using a
value chain model that puts communication services in
economic context. The approach has been applied suc-
cessfully to a number of cases in the Netherlands.
